summary: This mod adds some elements to the exterior area of High Hrothgar for a better visual experience.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/t94iid68u93u5py/manny.png?dl=1&token_hash=AAEIEPhxKj2lO3-1wXsAl9Vypgf6k4TsVc3sxuYWQTLS1Q[/img]

[img]http://s21.postimg.org/r9jyucuc7/titolo.png[/img]
[img]http://s24.postimg.org/ds3o27szp/900_2013_09_03_00016.jpg[/img][/center]


* OVERVIEW *
This mod adds some elements to the exterior area of High Hrothgar for a better visual experience.
The elements are:

- Some braziers
- Some banners
- 2 panoramic bridges

Lights are turned off in daytime (expect about burning braziers effects).
The mod is clear, simply and does not drops any fps, so install it without hesitation.

[center][img]http://s7.postimg.org/qq3b5osij/900_2013_09_03_00014.jpg[/img][/center]

* INSTALLATION *
Just place the ESP in data folder and then enable it via menu launcher

* UNINSTALLATION *
No clean savegame required, just delete it from data folder even if you're in High Hrothgar area.
However don't save when you stay on one of the panoramic bridges or you'll fall down when reload the game :)

[center][img]http://s14.postimg.org/7wzqszwo1/900_2013_09_03_00015.jpg[/img][/center]

* KNOWN ISSUES AND/OR BUGS *
There are no big issues on this mod. The only one is that lights will pop-up on weather change (Skyrim Engine bug, sorry)
This mod is not compatible with other mod that modify the High Hrothgar areas like Claralux.

* FACEBOOK *
I'm on Facebook, so join me if you want.
https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods

[center][img]http://s18.postimg.org/5lu5ajhzd/900_2013_09_03_00017.jpg[/img][/center]
author: MannyGT
